static SocialNet * newSocialNet (string &)

Detailed Description

This class SocialNet is a singleton AND a prototype manager. All the possibal concrete instances must be created by client code at program startup. The Instance() method is only responsible for cloneing existing instance, not creating one. Therefore the multi-thread problem can be avoided.
